name: Sepsis
description:
Infect the target's blood, dealing 2,192 Nature damage over 10 sec and gaining 1 use of any Stealth ability. If the target survives its full duration, they suffer an additional 784 damage and you gain 1 additional use of any Stealth ability for 10 sec.

Cooldown reduced by 30 sec if Sepsis does not last its full duration.

Awards 1 combo point.
